EmailTemplate.subject: January Partner Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
In This Issue:
- The Former CIO of GE Just Led a $50M Bet on Turbonomic - Turbonomic User Groups - 2017 IT Industry Predictions: A Look At What's To Come - Quarterly Town Hall: February 15th
Former CIO of GE Just Led a $50M Bet on Turbonomic
We are pleased to share an exciting piece of news regarding Turbonomic's growth. On Monday morning, Turbonomic announced <[[https://turbonomic.com/press-releases/former-ge-cio-gary-reiner-joins-turbonomic-board/]]> that it has secured $50 million in additional funding, led by General Atlantic, a leading global growth equity investment firm, as well as the addition of Gary Reiner <[[http://www.generalatlantic.com/people/gary-reiner/]]>, former CIO of GE and current Operating Partner at General Atlantic, to the company's Board of Directors.
Mr. Reiner, who says Turbonomic is "on the right side of history," brings with him a deep understanding of the challenges faced by CIOs in assuring application performance and maintaining a competitive advantage through implementing innovating IT strategies. Turbonomic plans to invest a significant portion of this funding in product development, particularly around hybrid and public cloud management capabilities. Both the fundraising and growth of Turbonomic's Board were profiled in Forbes <[[https://www.forbes.com/sites/alexkonrad/2017/01/23/turbonomic-raises-50-mil-from-general-atlantic/#535571ea6755]]> as one of "Today's Top Stories" on Monday. Turbonomic User Groups
Give your Turbonomic clients an opportunity to network and learn from other Turbonomic users! The Turbonomic User Groups <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/community/turbonomic-user-groups]]> are customer-led communities, serving as a place for IT professionals to network, share best practices, and engage in constructive conversations on cutting edge technology trends with their peers. Our goal is to foster a community benefitting existing Turbonomic customers, thus enhancing the user experience, and enabling users to strengthen their existing relationship with and understanding of Turboonmic's technology.
Your Turbonomic clients can sign up here <[[https://www.meetup.com/Chicago-Turbonomic-User-Group/events/236802639/]]> today for the User Group in Chicago, IL on Thursday, February 16th! 2017 IT Industry Predictions: A Look At What's To Come
Through our friends at VMBlog.com we presented our 2016 predictions <[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/2016-it-industry-predictions-a-look-at-whats-to-come/]]>, and this year we also welcomed the same team to give their thoughts on what's coming in 2017. How will Turbonomic fit in to your 2017 solutions for your clients based off of these 2017 IT Industry Predictions <[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/2017-it-industry-predictions/]]>? Join Us for Our Quarterly Town Hall!
Our upcoming Partner Town Hall <[[https://turbonomic.com/q1-17-partner-town-hall-meeting/]]> meeting will take place on Wednesday, February 15th at 11:00AM EST. These Quarterly Town Hall Meetings are an opportunity to voice questions, concerns and feedback but also discuss the following topics:
- New $50M Investment - Gary Reiner Joining Our Board of Directors - Upcoming Events - Q&A
Reserve <[[https://turbonomic.com/q1-17-partner-town-hall-meeting/]]> your spot today and stay informed about the various resources available to partners and future initiatives to support the partner community. Welcome New Customers
Join the Green Circle
Join the Green Circle Today <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/welcome?inviteID=12005]]>! The Green Circle is our online community where you can access all resources, like training materials, industry insight, informative forums and make the most of your partnership with Turbonomic. Questions?
If you have any questions please email us at partners@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:partners@turbonomic.com]]>. We always appreciate your feedback so feel free to send us suggestions on how to improve our partner program or request resources that you would like to see.
